t: LP Tunes stylus for HYM Seed turntable
s: LP TUNES STYLUS FOR HYM SEED TURNTABLEThe HYM Seed turntable was factory fitted with a Jasmine M1 MM phono cartridge. Its replacement stylus is depicted above. Do not order this stylus if it looks different from what you have. It will not fit if the original cartridge is missing or has been changed.

t: Seed Turntable Review: Stylish Contender For Ultimate All-In-One Audio System

t: Review: HYM Seed – vinyl made simple – audioFi.net
s: With turntable, amplification and ... box, the Seed is a simple, elegant solution that gives all you need to start enjoying music from an analogue format – and being a Bluetooth-enabled device, provides a measure of digital functionality too!
